channel.title: Susan Kelso on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Susan Kelso on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Active and Independent Living Improvement Programme (AILIP)
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm SM - Sarah Mitchell SK - Susan Kelso Sarah Mitchell, programme director for the Active and Independent Living Improvement Programme, and Susan Kelso, AHP Lead for Early Intervention with Scottish Government, spoke to Iriss.fm about the programme and the current Life Curve survey, which they would like AHP's to complete. The Active and Independent Living Improvement Programme, or AILIP, was officially launched on April 26th by Shona Robison, MSP Cabinet Secretary for Health and Sport.
